channel.title: Where do i install this code

item.title: Where do i install this code
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

cody kline:

Where exactly tho, cuz when i install in in the wrong place it messes up my whole server?

open up client.java and press control>F to bring up find. type in

if (command.startsWith("

for me it comes up with this but it probably won’t for you it doesn’t matter.

if (command.startsWith("cat")) { int cat = server.npcHandler.petnpc(772, absX - 1, absY - 1, heightLevel, 0,0,0,0,2,30000000); catexist = 1; catid = cat; catid2 = cat; catid3 = cat; catid4 = cat; }

anyways check out your command and after the very last } press enter and paste that barrows code. I don’t know if you need the lock and spawn == 0 thing though mine doesn’t have that but I’m not sure try it like you have it first

Read full topic
